summary: This code changes the directory to GPT2-chitchat, checks RAM consumption and urges to buy new RAM for CPU model testing. It runs 'interact.py' with no CUDA and using a specific model path.

details.comment: This code changes the directory to GPT2-chitchat, checks RAM consumption and urges to buy new RAM for CPU model testing. It runs 'interact.py' with no CUDA and using a specific model path.
details.content:
# no fucking gpu. just test how much RAM it consumes.
cd GPT2-chitchat # 1.8GB mem consumption. freaking hell.
# BUY NEW RAM AND RUN MODELS ON CPU!
python3 interact.py --no_cuda --model_path ../model
